synopsis.text: Boruto Uzumaki is the son of Naruto Uzumaki, the Seventh Hokage who is respected as a hero for his role in protecting the Hidden Leaf Village. However, Boruto completely rejects his father as he is constantly absent due to his Hokage duties. This makes Boruto determined to surpass his father and prove himself. As the Hidden Leaf Village prepares to host the Chunin Exams to train new shinobi, Boruto requests to become the apprentice of Naruto's friend and longtime rival, Sasuke Uchiha. Among the exam participants are Sasuke's daughter Sarada, who dreams of being Hokage one day, the talented shinobi Mitsuki, and Boruto himself. However, during the exams, the village is attacked by the ominous figures of Momoshiki and Kinshiki. Naruto shields Boruto but then disappears before his eyes. Now Boruto must reconcile his feelings toward his father and work with him and their allies, using the talents of the new generation, to face this threat and protect their cherished village.
